Wednesday, April 13, 8/7c
"Special"
Violence ensues and a mysterious island beast makes a re-appearance when Michael and Locke clash over Walt's upbringing. Meanwhile, Charlie is tempted to read the missing Claire's diary, and Sayid enlists Shannon to help decipher the French woman's map.

But there will be a special one-hour episode the 27th.

Special One-Hour Episode
   This special will take the bits and pieces of information the show has doled out about Jack, Kate, Locke, Sawyer, Charlie and Sayid over the last six months, and retell their stories in a linear fashion. There'll also be a segment on the island itself.
   Original US Airdate: 27 April 2005
